name: Forensics
desc: Different approaches to analyse and detect malware and to deal with compromised machines.

name: Hardware security
desc: Securing and attacking the low-level implementation of secure algorithms

name: Imaging security
desc: Watermarking, steganography, image forensics, biometrics, and video surveillance

name: Network softwerization
desc: Making networks more flexible thanks to NFV, SDN and cloud computing

name: Security applications
desc: Applications of secure communication mechanisms in the area of computer networks and distributed systems

name: Semantic web
desc: Making the data on the web more accessible to global automatic processing
